tokenRebateMechanism.description: Rebate applied per node operation based on carbon savings compared to traditional systems.

carbonEmissionPerNode.description: Carbon emissions generated per node operation per bounce.

energyConsumptionPerNode.description: Average energy consumption for a node operation.

nodeLimitPerToken.description: Each token supports one node within the network.

regionalFactors.description: Multipliers applied based on regional carbon and energy metrics.

pricingThresholds.description: Thresholds for token price fluctuation alerts.

carbonPricing.description: Frequency of updates to carbon pricing data.

energyConsumption.description: Frequency of updates to energy consumption data.

notes: This configuration defines token parameters, carbon and energy metrics, rebate mechanisms, and regional factors for pricing.
